column4: ...who translated Pidgin to russian? Translations of plugin names is HORRIBLE.

no its for jaunty and karmic too
Oh... I see... Ah, didn't notice the "+" over there.
Eh... But that's not the problem. It hangs my computer up when it gets to 47%. Why the heck?
might be your hardrive is the problem?

It's not a real hard-drive or anything, it's a... eh... file. Kinda. Ever heard of TrueCrypt? So... it's in /dev/mapper/truecrypt1 because I chose to "not mount" it, so I can format it to another filesystem. ext4 and others work fine with this kinda stuff.
I dunno, i'm a pidgin user lol
Install the "dkms" package, which provides Dynamic KernelModule Support.
Oh. Hm, well... Then those drivers don't support DKMS and i think you'll have to either keep on reinstalling em or stick to a specific kernel version
